cause.description:
Let's help the Poor, to also Acquire Education at a higher level. Bright somebody's future, and also the lord will make you smile forever.
In Africa, many students are stopping on the way, yet there heads are ready to continue, but because of money, they have to pull out from school. If you can help such people, please do with all your heart. I do believe that, they will never forget you in future.
1. Help some body acquire Education.
2. Let's abolish illitrate in Uganda.
3. Let's show love to those who need it.
cause.mission: Help the Poor to acquire Education.
cause.name: Education Assistance
